tweet: I guess I'm going to have to ask to be unblended.  I'm tired of taking nothing but sales call.  I HATE doing sales.
notes that taking (legal) drugs before going to work can really mellow you out and make work a lot more bearable.
watched the JJ Abrams Star Trek last night on DVD.  Really enjoyed it this time.  Saw it in the theatre, but couldn't enjoy it there.
is happy that with this week's paycheck, the cardiologist is PIF and the hospital is 25% paid off.  I HATE max out of pocket expenses.
notes that it's 37F out so I did wear long pants and even a long sleeved shirt, but NO coat.  It's not that cold yet!
